name: PreschoolPhonics
0:
”Alexa, start preschool phonics”
”a for apple”
”b for bat”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: preschool phonics
des:
Game 1 - Word game
Alexa will ask for a word starting with a random Alphabet. Once the user replies with the correct word, Alexa will then spell out the word. If uninterrupted Alexa will play with all the 26 English Alphabets. 
Game 2 - Spell bee
Alexa will say a word. Once the user spell the word, Alexa will say whether the answer is correct or wrong. if uninterrupted the game goes on.
User have option to switch game at any moment by specifying the game names as per the format.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
